abstract: Research in Motion, maker of the BlackBerry, has been the object of persistent deal speculation this year as a result of a string of weak financial reports, service outages and worries over lost market share.
snippet: Research in Motion, maker of the BlackBerry, has been the object of persistent deal speculation this year as a result of a string of weak financial reports, service outages and worries over lost market share.
lead_paragraph: Speculation about suitors circling Research in Motion breathed new life into its shares on Wednesday.

headline.main: RIM Shares Jump on Takeover Whispers

abstract: A handful of noteworthy apps for the iPhone were introduced this year.
snippet: A handful of noteworthy apps for the iPhone were introduced this year.
lead_paragraph: For iPhone owners, 2011 brought a flood of new apps, but in many cases they struggled to outshine last year’s best. So rather than present a top 10 list that includes names from 2010, I’m including only apps that had their debuts this year. If you really want to turbocharge your device, combine these with last year’s picks. (Note that this list doesn’t include games, which will be the subject of a separate post on the Gadgetwise blog.) Like last year’s list, this one includes many free picks.

headline.print_headline: Some New Little Treasures for the iPhone
